meanings.definition: More yellow in color than something else.
meanings.sent1: The sunflower was yellower than the daisy.
meanings.sent2: The banana peel was yellower than the apple skin.
meanings.sent3: The lemon thought it was the yellower fruit in the basket.
meanings.sent4: The golden retriever's fur was yellower than the wheat fields.
meanings.sent5: The daffodil stood out as the yellower flower in the garden.

meanings.definition: To become more yellow in color.
meanings.sent1: The leaves yellower as autumn approached.
meanings.sent2: The painting yellower over time due to sun exposure.
meanings.sent3: The old photo yellower with age, just like grandpa's teeth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to yellower with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The sky yellower as the sun began to set.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that yellows.
meanings.sent1: The yellower of the two apples was juicier.
meanings.sent2: The yellower in the painting caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The yellower in the group always wore bright clothes.
meanings.sent4: The yellower of the siblings loved sunny days.
meanings.sent5: The yellower in the class had a sunny disposition.
